title: Womens Maxi Dress Formal Mermaid Maxi V Neck
title_original: V Neck Long Velvet Formal Dresses Mermaid Maxi Formal Prom Party Gowns for Women

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #137,443 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #669 in Women's Formal Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Formal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible dress!
items.body: This dress is stunning, the perfect fit for a black tie wedding! The material is only a little but stretchy, so definitely be careful with which size you choose. Thankfully, it fits me perfectly! The length is also good. With heels, I won't have to make any alterations!The material is thick and quality is great! Read more
items.author: Marc mcdonough

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wedding guest dress!
items.body: The quality of this dress was fantastic, and I appreciated it being lined underneath! The zipper was pretty difficult because of all of the fabric that gathers on the side, but we made it work. The Royal Blue color was perfect for a fall wedding. I felt like the style was extremely appropriate for a formal wedding, I didn't feel like I was over or underdressed. I did find one that I liked better but this dress was SO beautiful and flattering!! Read more
items.author: Dennis Gillis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Received so many compliments!
items.body: Loved it. Felt amazing in it. It was a little itchy under the arms but nothing out of control. The back was a little bumpy by the stitching. I'm going to have a seamstress try to fix. It does look like you are naked underneath at first look but I got many compliments. I wore this for a networking gala.Beautiful dress, very elegant, fits really good, affordable price! Read more
items.author: WalkerAlice

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it, gorgeous dress
items.body: This dress is absolutely stunning! The material was way stretchier than I expected which was great. The length was great for me with and without heels.I have a small chest (typically wear a 30C or 32A) but made the girls look great. Wish I had more places to wear just a pretty dress. Read more
items.author: JohnsonRyan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Mermaid Maxi V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Mermaid Maxi V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Red Brown, Olive Green, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Plum, Blush Pink, Ocean Green, Royal Blue, Mustard Yellow, Teal, Lemon Green, Cameo Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
